pageContext.claim: “They didn't want to use concrete. I said, Okay, I'll use steel. It's stronger. It's also more expensive, by the way. But it's stronger. I'll use steel.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump suggests that Democrats requested a steel barrier rather than a concrete wall, but the proposed switch to steel was an idea the Trump administration brought up. No Democrats are on record demanding a steel barrier along the U.S.-Mexico border.
